name: Marshmellow Cat a Javascript Framework
description:
Marshmellow Cat is a simple yet effecient Javascript Framework that allows you to build games easily with Javascript that runs on pretty much anything that supports HTML and Javascript including but not limited too many platforms including Windows, Mac, Linux, Windows Phone, Android, IOS.

Marshmellow Cat features:

-A stand alone framework with only one single HTML file

-Marshmellow Cat is a single file under 1/2 a megabyte.

-Multiplatform (can run on even some game consoles !)

-Supports multiple input methods (keyboard, touch screen, controller) / try clicking or touching screen

-Games work both offline and online and can be downloaded

-Simple code with very detailed discriptions

-Real functional coding language (used even to display this web page and content)

-->HTML, Javascript, & tiny bit of CSS 

-Easy to understand and easy to use whether you are new to coding or experienced

-In game sprite manipulation

-Sprites in the code !

-Small or large sprites (scale drawn at is inter-changeable aswell)

-Animating is a breeze and is incorperated into function

-On that note can also be used for making animations aswell

-Your video games can scale to full screen automatically

-Portrait or Landscape veiws or even both where applicable (smartphones & tablets etc whatever picks up on the feature)

-Online networking is possible to add to your game. But not included to keep simplicity down (may include in a separate, mergeable package later as there is already libraries avaliable for networking)

-Once purchased you have access to all additional content  in the future for free

-Re download anytime if you lose or edit the file without making copy by accident :)

-Edit your game file with nearly any text or code editor on most platforms, computer or phone, and then run them on such platforms aswell

-Easily embed your video games or  interactive content into your, or your clients webpage

-Produce increadibly small sized video games, but with big fun !
